fw.name: CATSurfacicOpeInterfaces

class.name: CATIGSMAutomaticFillGeo
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that fills a space defined by a set of wires.

method.name: AddInnerWires
method.abstract: Sets one inner wire.

method.name: AddPassingCurve
method.abstract: Sets a passing curve.

method.name: AddPassingPoint
method.abstract: Sets a passing point.

method.name: GetFillType
method.abstract: Returns the fill type.

method.name: GetG0MaxAccuracy
method.abstract: Returns the maximum admissible continuity gap on the result.

method.name: GetG0MaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum continuity gap on the result.

method.name: GetG0MaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum continuity gap regards to a particular edge.

method.name: GetG1MaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum tangency gap (in radians) on the result.

method.name: GetG1MaxDeviation
method.abstract: Returns the maximum tangency gap (in radians) regards to a particular edge.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: OrientationByFirstEdge
method.abstract: Defines the orientation of the fill face.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetFlatFaceMode
method.abstract: Activates the flat face mode.

method.name: SetGapTolerance
method.abstract: Sets the tolerance maximum.

method.name: SetPassingCurves
method.abstract: Sets a list of passing curves.

method.name: SetPassingPoints
method.abstract: Sets a list of passing points.

method.name: SetTransitionContinuity
method.abstract: Defines the continuity criteria to take into account for a given wire (<tt>ADVANCED mode</tt>).

method.name: UsingCommonSupport
method.abstract: Using common support of input wire if exist.

class.name: CATIGSMFactoryGeo
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that fills a space defined by a set of wires.

method.name: CATGSMCreateTopologicalAutomaticFill
method.abstract: Creates a topological operator that fills a closed area defined by a set of wires.

method.name: CATGSMCreateTopologicalAutomaticFill
method.abstract: Creates a topological operator that fills a closed area defined by a set of wires.
